capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's beard is really growing in, isn't it? I've noticed he's been taking good care of himself lately.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is the supervisor of the title company. I can confirm that, and I'm certain about it.

So Vernon is my supervisor at the title company, right? I'm not really sure about that, but it seems like he's in charge of overseeing our department. To be honest, I find him to be a bit intimidating, which makes me feel anxious when we have meetings.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia's hair is blond. I'm quite sure about that, and I think it's a pretty obvious fact.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just reading about Minerva McGonagall's life and it turns out she's still an adult at heart. I mean, can you imagine being a professor of Transfiguration at Hogwarts and still having that youthful energy? It's really inspiring to see someone who's been around for so long and yet still manages to be so vibrant and full of life.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what are some of mcgonagall's talents?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him, I'm certain of it. He seems like a responsible kid for his age, doesn't he?
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of personality does dudley have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley's personality is often described as selfish. I've noticed that about him myself. He can come across as quite self-centered at times.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what character is known for being selfish?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Flitwick is indeed my title and a very important one at that. I'm quite certain about it, and I feel confident in saying that it's a mantra that guides me as a professor. It's a sentiment of pride and responsibility that drives me to excel in my role.
